title: Vanilla Almond Granola
directions: Preheat oven to 300F degrees. Line a large sheet pan with parchment.
Toss the oats, almonds, cinnamon, sugar and salt in a large bowl. Set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk the maple syrup and melted butter together until combined.
Whisk in the vanilla extract. Pour over the oats and toss to coat. Make sure all of the oats are moistened.
Spread onto the prepared baking sheet and bake for 45 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes. Allow granola to cool completely - the air will helpÂ the granola obtain a crunchy texture.
